name: dropbox-plugin
description: Dropbox integration plugin for AGNT - Manage files and folders in Dropbox
author: AGNT

schema.title: Dropbox API
schema.description: Interact with Dropbox to perform various operations on files and folders.

action.description: The action to perform on Dropbox

path.description: The path of the file or folder in Dropbox (e.g., '/Documents/file.txt')

content.description: The content of the file to upload (for UPLOAD_FILE action)

newPath.description: The new path for the file or folder (for MOVE_FILE action)

success.description: Indicates whether the Dropbox operation was successful

result.description: The data returned by the Dropbox operation

error.description: Error message if the Dropbox operation failed
